item.title: Inclusionary Zoning in Paris and New York: Antidote to Gentrification or Trojan's Horse?
item.description: The research project examines how Inclusionary Zoning (IZ) impacts the housing markets of neighborhoods where it is implemented. The study focuses on the impacts of IZ in New York City and Paris, two cities at the forefront of adopting IZ in their respective countries.
